nodes.text: Morellia was an astronomical object located within the Morellia system, a part of the Wild Space star cluster known as the Morellian Commonwealth. It was the homeworld of the Morellian lawman and scout Barosa Warren.

Morellia was introduced in Alliance Intelligence Reports, a 1995 sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Morellia system, and therefore the celestial object Morellia, in grid square S-3.
